text: Turner Classic Movies (TCM) is a cable television channel featuring commercial-free classic movies, mostly from the Turner Entertainment and Warner Bros. film libraries, which include many MGM, United Artists, RKO and Warner Bros. titles. Movie historian Robert Osborne used to host the channel until his retirement in early 2016. == Other websites == * TCM US * TCM Canada Category:Time Warner Category:American television channels Category:Cable television
title: Turner Classic Movies
